flawed_nl_solution:
The fixer used 3/10*400 = <<3/10*400=120>>120 nails to fix the kitchen.
The number of nails remaining in the container after he fixes the kitchen is 400-120 = <<400-120=208>>208
He also uses 7/10*208 = <<7/10*208=728/5>>728/5 of the nails remaining in the container to fix the fence.
The total number of nails which the fixer hasn't used is 208-728/5 = <<208-728/5=312/5>>312/5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 280, not 208. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
